
                            
                            <p>在永辉超市买蘑菇长毛了  <br> 打了客服电话 <br> 开始说赔一张50-10的优惠卷  <br> 打了12345和食药监  <br> 拿出来食品安全法  <br> 最后赔了800 <br> 一定要维护好自己的权益  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/133427y5hapiynwpf5z2h5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/133427y5hapiynwpf5z2h5.jpg"> </p>
